explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions using machine-learning techniques to develop and confirm the Omega Score, a predictor of SME default.
explanations.classification: The Omega Score is used to predict SME default, which is a classification problem (predicting whether an SME will default or not).
explanations.regression: The paper uses LASSO (Least Absolute Shrinkage and Selection Operator), which is a regression method, to develop the Omega Score.
